title: Cinnamon, banana and blueberry muffins
description: Knock-up a batch of these quick and easy low-fat muffins from The Hairy Bikers in under half an hour.Each serving contains 256kcal, 5.5g protein, 44g carbohydrates (of which 19g sugars), 6g fat (of which 1.5g saturates), 2g fibre and 0.5g salt.
ingredients: 1 tsp ground cinnamon, plus Â½ tsp extra for the topping
